item.title: How Many Corsi-Rosenthal Boxes Do You Need?
item.description: Source Formula Air changes/hour (ACH) = 60 x CADR/Volume Assumptions CR Box CADR = 275 CFM Goal is 6 ACH Already have 1.5 ACH from ventilation, so you need 4.5 ACH Imperial units # boxes = 4.5 x volume/(60x275) = 2.7e-4 x volume (cb ft) In metric (under-ventilated) # boxes = volume (m^3)/100 Examples Typical under-ventilated classroom - 800 sq ft, 9’ ceilings = 7200 c.ft # boxes = 2.7e-4 x 7200 = 2 Classroom with minimum ASHRAE standards: Ventilation = 3.
